Take no chances, blob like Cristiano has to become true!
What if he was placed under a ‘Liquid Diet’?
Immobile or mobile? Who cares! Let’s start to tenderize that meat!
1241111112222.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo woke up with a yawn, his sleep interrupted by a growling sound he had become accustomed to hearing. As he woke up, he slowly began the arduous task of placing himself against the bed stand. It never dawned on him that it shouldn’t have been such a hard task to perform. Still, by pushing with all his might (for what strength he still had), he managed to place his back vertically, reaching a seated position on the bed. Yet, he was now left tired and covered in sweat, as he wasn’t used anymore to exert any kind of exercise.

But as tired and hungry he was, help was right beside him as one of the two ‘personal nurses’ was right beside him, with a large platter filled with donuts and pastries.

“Good Morning Sir, here have some of your pre-breakfast.”

Cristiano didn’t even reply, he simply opened his mouth and began eating away at whatever he was receiving. The nurse, Nastassja, was enjoying the presence of the fattened-up player. She had accepted that job because she knew that he had the potential of becoming one of the biggest. She had enjoyed working in the Resort, the possibility to be around feeders and feedees, to be there watching them grow and be stuffed was something she loved but, they always left after a while.

So, when Coach Podrick had asked her and her colleague to join him she accepted at the condition of being able to stay at Cristiano’s side forever. Nastassja was brought back from her reverie when she heard a pitiful whining just beside her, looking down she realized that Cristiano had already cleared out the platter and was whimpering from hunger.

“Now, now, Sir, it isn’t over yet…”

She simply placed the empty platter on the floor and quickly took a second one from a nearby trolley, starting once again to push more food into Cristiano, as he began to fall into his eating trance once more.

James watched from afar, through one of many hidden cameras he had placed in the room. He spied on Cristiano, watching as he kept on eating and growing fatter. It had been already a week since they returned from the Resort, and yet the player had never said anything against the deluge of goodies that everyone around him kept pushing on him.

James smiled wickedly at the thought that soon the player was going to be shamed publicly and, as soon as he was going to be left alone, He could swoop him up and do with him as he pleased.

Podrick licked his lips as he imagined the massively obese Cristiano slowly roasting in a pan, prepared just as if he was a Thanksgiving turkey. Yet, the obese soccer player could still grow more and so he brought those thoughts back into the deepest part of his mind. As he resumed watching Cristiano standing up and preparing himself for the, almost only, exercise he kept on doing.

Standing, while kept upright with the help of the two nurses, Cristiano looked even bigger than he was.

His face had softened to the point that his cheeks seemed to be stuffed with small balls, his three chins were almost constantly jiggling, as a fourth one began to make its appearance. His moobs, huge globular sack of fat, fell blobbily on his chest, slowly moving to either side of him, pushed away by his ever-growing gut.

And what a belly it was.

Divided in three belly rolls, it truly was an apron of a gut, covering his man part and, lately, starting to reach for his knees. His belly button was deep and wide, it could almost suck two fingers within itself. His hips had also grown wider, other than fatter, forcing him to waddle slowly to avoid, as much as possible, to chafing his thighs.

Yes, Cristiano had truly reached a new level of obesity and Podrick saw confirmation in this when he checked the scale hidden inside the bed through the laptop he was using within his private room.

‘6-8-4 ’

Six hundred eighty-four pounds of ex soccer player.

James felt his head spinning as he read that three-digit number. Cristiano, world known soccer player had grown past six hundred pounds of fat in one month.

True, James had had to use chemicals and stimulants to push him further and further but, still…

And yet, the guy didn’t seem to notice. Well, also that wasn’t true. Cristiano had tried to fight back but, thanks to his ill placed faith in him and the constant onslaught of food, any thoughts of going back had simply disappeared. And thus, the New Cristiano had been created.

An always hungry eating machine, which passed more than twenty hours, each day, stuffing his mouth even though he wasn’t aware of it.

James decided to close his laptop and join the nurses into Cristiano’s room as he saw that the player was going to enter the simulation to start his exercise session for the day.

As Podrick entered the room he was greeted with the magnificent sight of Cristiano as he tried to place his titanic ass on the small-ish seat of the simulator. As the player realized that his coach was there, he tried to turn toward him, while still being hand-fed by his nurses, only to find himself stuck inside the simulator cabin.

“Hey, Cristiano, already up?”

“Yesh Coach *ulp*! I wanted…to practish…shome more…before going…to breakfast…”

“Well, that’s good but, don’t forget that you’re still on rest, so don’t push yourself too much. If you don’t feel up to it, just let it go for today.”

“You…really…think…so…Coach?”

“Sure, Cristiano. It never pays to over-exert yourself. You might end up hurting yourself even worse.
C’mon, let’s go back to bed. Take a break for today and tomorrow you will practice some more. Rest up and load up on energy.”

Cristiano burped quite loudly as his body continued to process and digest the massive amount of food it already contained, trying to make room for what more was coming. And yet he smiled at the thought of taking it easy with his practice sessions. He always felt tired and utterly spent of energies after his practice on the simulator, but he couldn’t realize that in truth it was his own body that was making him so tired.

With his atrophied muscles, and all that fat on his body, it was already a miracle he could still waddle, albeit slowly, but for James it wasn’t enough.

Cristiano had to become an immobile blob of a man before becoming his meal. And yet, the thought of seeing a barely mobile Cristiano, wearing his way too small soccer suit as he moved slowly on a soccer field, under the silent stare of thousands, made James shiver in anticipation.

But was that the correct course of action?

If Cristiano was still able to move, he still could be saved. While if he was to be fattened up to immobility, the chances of him recovering were very slim. But to lose the chance to utterly humiliate him and disgrace him in front of thousands of witnesses was very alluring.

What was a Cannibal Coach to do?
1241111112222.title: Super Obesus Sapiens

choices: Cristiano tries to move from his bed but can’t manage on his own
The bed literally breaks under Cristiano’s weight
He begin to feel so hungry he cannot stop eating
Cristiano wants to meet his Fianceé Georgina Rodriguez
12411111122224.content:
The following day, as Cristiano was waking up and beginning his daily activities, he saw his coach enter the room with a huge smile on his face.

“Yo…Coach…what’s…the good…news?”

James simply smiled even more as he quickly ordered the two nurses around to help Cristiano stand.

“Oh, Cristiano. I just got news from our sponsors that you’ve been selected to try a new kind of fitness therapy. Thanks to this therapy, so they say, your recovery should speed up way faster.”

Crsitiano smiled weakly at the news, only the mentioning of any kind of physical activity was unconsciously treated as a bad news from the overfed soccer player. Still, for his coach to be this excited it had to be something so, he simply nodded and, helped by his nurses, he slowly followed Podrick toward the bathroom in his room. Once there, he saw that the jacuzzi pool wasn’t actually filled with water, but with some yellowish liquid which, in truth, caused his own belly to rumble hungrily.

“What…is...that...?”

“That, Cristiano, is melted butter. Apparently, it should help relax and reinvigorate your body. As per the new therapy that you’ve got to follow, you’ll have to have at the very least two immersions each day. Don’t you worry, I’m sure you will love it.”

Cristiano didn’t seem as excited as James was but, with nothing to lose he moved his body toward the pool and slowly entered it, until only his head was breaking the surface. As a few minutes passed by, he began to feel nice in there.

The melted butter was kinda greasy but, its warmth was doing wonder to help relax the ex-soccer player. As he sat in the pool he didn’t seem to realize that he alone was almost occupying the entire pool and, before he could muster any thoughts, his nurses came to him carrying with them a funnel, some small kegs of beer and several trolley’s worth of food.

“Now Sir, as your Coach instructed, we will proceed with the new therapy plan.

As per instruction received, as you dip and relax, we will provide you with booze and food, the first will help you reach a deeper sense of calm, the second will be part of your new diet.”

Before Cristiano could say anything the two nurses had placed a tube into his mouth and, through the funnel, they began pouring liters of beer inside of the obese soccer player. He, from his side, couldn’t do much but sit back, relax and swallow, and so he did. After a while though, Cristiano felt the tube between his lips being taken away, as his two nurses moved closer, bringing him the food for his new diet.

As he rubbed his blubbery gut with slow circular movements, starting to enjoy the feeling of all that butter surrounding him, he saw that the first platter they brought to his lips was a huge triple decker burger, with lots of sauce and fried bacon. That burger was so greasy that already a small pool of it was starting to accumulate on the platter but, for Cristiano nothing mattered but to have that within himself in the shortest time possible.

For almost two hours the nurses continued to feed Cristiano with greasy food and beer, until they noticed that the level of melted butter in the pool had drastically reduced.

Smiling, the two helped Cristiano get out of the jacuzzi and, still dripping buttery goodness, they brough him toward a large massage bed nearby.

“Here, Sir. Please to lie down here so that we can provide you with a nice massage. Afterward, we will move to your bed so you can rest a bit before having your daily exercise regimen into the simulator.”

The player, absentmindedly licking his own fingers, simply did as he was asked and soon found himself in a new kind of paradise. As he lay on the bed, one of his two nurses massaged him slowly but forcefully, kneading every inch of his fattened body, while the other brought to him even more snacks and food for him to consume.

“Eat up, Sir, you need to load up all the energies you can muster.”

Cristiano felt in heaven.

Between his still sensitive skin being massaged and the delicious sweets that he was eating he honestly felt at his best. Still, for one moment, he began to wonder why he was eating so much but, it was nothing but a fleeting thought, soon swept away by the avalanche of delicious goods passing within his lips.

Almost an hour later, feeling full to bursting, Cristiano was slowly moved from the bathroom toward his room and, in the fifteen minutes he needed to change room, he began to feel himself grow hungry again.

Nevermind that he had eaten all morning, he just felt his stomach rumble hungrily, demanding sustenance. Food had become his staple and the absence of it something that his body feared.

The two nurses smiled between themselves and, without even asking, they began once more to push more and more goodies into Cristiano’s mouth. He greedily accepted everything that was given him, it didn’t matter anymore about his ‘illness’ nor the thought of his needing to load up energies.

He ate because there was food within reach.

As soon as James realized that Cristiano was stopping to care about his surrounding a wicked smile twisted his face.

‘Between the new Therapy and the constant feeding, if I can get to have Cristiano forget about anything but eating, then he will be one step closer to being ready.

It almost seems a shame to be so close to my objective but, I’m also excited to know how tasty he will be as soon as he reach the ton mark.

It shouldn’t take long at this rate…’

From that day, Cristiano began to have his therapy baths two times each day, along with the beer drinking, food stuffing and body massage. As good as he was feeling he simply stopped caring about everything else, all that mattered was to reach that heavenly feeling and to have his gut full.

Apart from that, nothing.

Podrick closely followed Cristiano as he plunged deeper and deeper into the gluttony abyss, as he forced him to have each meal bigger and more fattening than the last. Between those and the buttery baths, Cristiano seemed to balloon even faster, adding to his body another two hundred pounds in less than a month.

Until one fateful morning, almost two months since meeting with Podrick,….
12411111122224.title: Kobe Treated Cristiano

choices: Focus more on the eating and less on his future
Become a slave for the fake Georgina, obedient to all of her wishes
act against the secrecy of his sanctuary, requesting a vacation somewhere
experiment with immobility, slob and laziness
124111111222244.content:
Two more months had passed, and Cristiano had done nothing more than eat and sleep, while taking the occasional butter bath.

Podrick couldn’t have been prouder of how big and fat the once soccer player had become. The guy was now almost completely immobile, he could barely stand, and only with someone’s help. The once soccer player was already beginning to lose his own human shape, growing more and more like a small blubbery mountain. His arms had grown so large that were roughly the size of another person thighs, and his legs were even bigger. His whole body was beginning to overtake all his legs, when seated, leaving out of this belly apron his blown-out feet’s.

Nothing seemed to be capable of ruining the momentum that Cristiano had reached but, alas, something did happen. On a fateful morning Cristiano had just finished having his buttery bath, and was now enjoying the feeding/massage session with his girls when, out of nowhere, as James passed in front of him, the hugely obese player blurted out something that made James feel a cold chill behind his back.

“Hey…Coach…was…wondering. Can...I meet…my girl…one of…these days?”

James, unable to give a proper answer right back, took time.

He didn’t give a clear answer and was glad when the nurses started again to feed Cristiano, shutting him up for the moment. Still here was an issue as big as a house…better yet, as big as Cristiano!

Apart from the Company, the rest of the world knew that Cristiano Ronaldo was in a sort of break, nobody knew what had really befallen him but, how could James prevent Georgina Rodriguez to reveal the truth to the world? He had only one possibility.
Cristiano was going to meet his girl…but she wasn’t going to meet him.


James had thought long and hard on this and finally, as he was surfing the net, an idea came to his mind. What if Cristiano could meet someone that seemed to be the exact copy of his fiancée, but wasn’t really her? There were risks, no doubt about that but, there didn’t seem to be much of a choice. Quickly James began to contact people from the shady part of the deep web, handsomely paying in advance for a certain product that would allow him to play the role of a certain someone.

Even though he paid quite a hefty sum to have the product finished in the shortest time, a month still had to pass before the product was finally within his hands. As James observed the item he had just received, a wicked grin appeared on his face. With this he could take two doves with one stone. It was an oversized VR device and, along with it, came a nice little DVD package containing the installer for the custom-made software requested by Podrick.

After toying a bit with both the VR and the software, James felt confident enough to bring the good news to his soon-to-be overfed meal.

As James entered the room, he clearly saw that Cristiano was starting to grow restless. Although being constantly fed with a deluge of treats and sweets, there was animosity on his swollen face. James could see the anger growing within the ex-player as he munched harshly on whatever bit of food he had in his mouth.

“Cristiano?”

“*Urrff!* Yeah…Coach? What do…you want…now?”

“Just wanted to thank you for your patience. I may have figured out a way for you to meet with your girlfriend.”

Instantly the ultra-obese began to distend himself, letting go of the anger he was nurturing within himself.

“Really…Coach? But…you said…”

Now it was James turn to make everything believable.

“I said that you couldn’t meet her in here, since nobody has to know about your condition. In fact the Company would react harshly if I was to ask for something as foolish as to invite someone in here, when everything is done in secrecy to keep you hidden.
But, with time and a little bit of…ehm…grease in the right places… I may have found a solution to this problem.”

Cristiano began to jiggle in excitement, although he managed to move for barely a minute before stopping, feeling himself tired and void of any energies.

“I…Feel…there is…a but…somewhere…”

“Unfortunately, Cristiano, there is one. You shall not be able to meet her in person.

You see, through some friends I may have smuggled something from outside to here and to your fiancée house. Something that will enable the two of you to be in contact, even though only visually, with one another.”

It was then that James showed to Cristiano the VR device.

“This, Cristiano, is a last generation full immersion headset. With it, one can go and meet someone in a previously prepared setting. Basically, while in a room like this one you could…”

“I could…finally meet…Georgina!”

“Yes! As I’ve said, though, it would still be a connection through internet but, thanks to this headset, you’ll be able to experience almost any sensation while using it. Sense of smell, of taste…”

“That…is so…Cool! Thanks…Man! It’s a…shame…I cannot…meet her… face to face…. but…How…Can I…repay you…for all…these…troubles?”

“Your happiness and confidence in me are all the gifts I may ever want. Trust in me, Cristiano.
If you’ve got a problem…I will find a solution.”

James brought the device to Cristiano, helping him to wear it as he explained to him how to make it work and letting him know that his girlfriend had been already instructed on how to use it. All Cristiano had to do was to call and wait for her response. Ronaldo smiled as he grabbed the strange looking helmet and put it on, but his smile grew wider when he turned the machine on and found himself in this 3D recreation of the same room he was in. Although he couldn’t see his own body.

Suddenly, in front of him he realized that a form was beginning to appear, grinning excitedly he slowly saw the form of his fiancée appear right before him.

“G-Georgina? Is it really you?”

The girl smiled as she watched him, bringing a finger to her lips, as she bit slowly her nail while smiling.

“Sure am, Baby. I was getting worried about you. But then this Podrick guy contacted me and…Wow! We’re finally together!”

As the girl said so she launched herself at Cristiano, which in turn hugged her back and felt her body against his own, felt her perfume in his nostrils. She was there, with him! True, they weren’t physically there but, feeling as he was in that moment, he couldn’t care less about reality.

“Oh, Georgina…I’ve missed you so much!”


Meanwhile, as Cristiano jiggled to and fro on his bed, carefully watched by his two nurses, James was sitting comfortably in his own private room, as he checked and clicked on his personal computer. On the screen he could see the avatar of Cristiano and, at the bottom of the screen, whatever he was saying at that moment.

‘Yes…This has been a marvelous idea. Not only that fool thinks to really be with his girlfriend, but I could even use Georgina’s to push him even more into the abyss of gluttony! All I must do is to keep using this Georgina model to trick Cristiano and soon I could have him do whatever I wish…

Why, I could even force him to…’
124111111222244.title: Georgina, meet Cristiano

choices: ...Confronted the fake Georgina about his massive size
…Found himself unable to move any part of him
…Started to love how big he was getting,wishing to grow bigger and bigger still
…Began feeling constantly hungry, no matter how much he ate
1241111112222441.content:
In the following days Cristiano Ronaldo lost all of his bitterness and returned to his own normal state of being, which was acting like a glutton. Thanks to his sessions with the VR headset, he managed to explain to the fake Georgina all of his troubles and of his apparent illness.

The reaction he got from her left him speechless at first but, as she insisted on it, he quickly adapted to it.

“So you see, Georgie, due to this strange illness I’m forced to stay away from the field and, since they don’t know yet when I can be considered stable…Management has decided to keep things silent and as more quiet possible.”

“Oh god, Baby…But are you ok?”

“Yeah. Apart from feeling tired all the time I’m good…”

“Babe, I know my man doesn’t like being ordered around but, this time, do it for me…Do as they tell you. If they want to keep things quiet it must be that they’re afraid of something so, don’t go against them.”

“I won’t, Georgie…for you, anything.”

Cristiano sat on the verge of the illusionary bed, in the holographic room he was in, while keeping within his arms his fiancée, completely unaware that the person he was talking to was, in truth, James Podrick.

“Also, babe, I must say that you’re looking terrific. Whatever they’re doing to you is making wonders on your body…I wonder what would happen if you asked to intensify your treatment…”

Cristiano began to feel excited, it wasn’t often that Georgina came onto him like that so he quickly nodded to her proposal.

“Y-Yeah” he stammered a little “I’ll see what can be done but, are you sure about that, honey?”

“Oh yeah, love. Whatever it is, you seem to be way more buff than you ever were…If things keep going this way I’ll have trouble not to think about you…all day long.”

When Cristiano finally ended his session on the VR he felt hot and bothered, he would have loved to be able to stay with Georgina in real life but, he knew, that it wasn’t yet possible. Still, thanks to his wonderful coach he at least, could see her occasionally and that was good enough. As he placed the visor on the bed, he soon found himself once more to what his life had become. Him eating as girls at his side fawned around him.

As he kept on eating, he tried to look at himself and, although he couldn’t see much, he seemed to convince himself that what Georgina had told of him had to be true. He truly seemed to have been growing bigger (and in his deluded mind buffer) than before. And yet, the proposition of his fiancée had taken root in his mind and when he saw Podrick coming to see him he broached the subject to him.

“Hey…Coach… Was…wondering,… the…therapy…and…all…seem… to… be … going…great, but…maybe…we…could…enhance… it…a …bit…more?”

James Podrick, who had just entered the room, had been waiting for that request for a long time. It had been two long weeks of him impersonating Georgina until he managed to convince Cristiano.

But finally, he had managed.

Yet, he had to maintain his image and so he adopted for a dubious glance toward the massive man, almost completely paralyzed on his bed.

“Enhance it? Mmm…I don’t know, Cristiano. I don’t make the rules here.
I just bring you what the Management has agreed upon.”

“And…yet…if…I…was…to…increase…the…pace…wouldn’t…I… heal…faster?”

“Well, I suppose that’s true. But are you sure about that Cristiano? If we increase the pace, you will have less time to spend with… you know who.”

“Y-Yeah…I…know…that. Still…I…guess…could…be…better…for…me…and…my…career. Please…Coach…I…feel…I’ve…gotta…do…all…I…can.”

“Alright, alright. I’ll ask for them to produce an enhanced plan for your recovery. I’ll let you know by tomorrow morning what they decided to do.”

In the following days James gleefully watched as Cristiano went under a drastic change in his daily schedule.
His rest times were cut by half and substituted with intensified feeding sessions of the “health bars” sludge he was growing addicted to. Moreover, it was included into his mealtimes a special feeding session in which he was instructed to consume a double lunch meal in a liquefied format. This not only meant that he could ingest more calories than usual, but also that his overfed, apron like, belly would absorb the nutrients at a faster pace than before, forcing him to feel his hunger grow again sooner than before. The liquid diet, also, had the exceptional advantage that didn’t seem to tire him out, since he had only to swallow without any chewing from his part.

Barely a week passed with the enhanced diet and Cristiano already began to grow steadily fatter from it.

If before he had seemed to slow down in his gains, with the new regimen he pushed himself out of the plateau and began to grow bigger and larger once more.

James could barely restrain himself watching the ex-soccer player inflate with food and fat, as more time passed, it was getting harder and harder for him to not show his own desire to prepare Cristiano as his own meal. Often he found himself caressing the bloated and/or stuffed form of the player, massaging his belly rolls and playing with his belly fat as he imagined him ready to be placed in a roasting pan. Other times he found himself all over the guy as he was passed out from his eating, hugging as much as he could of the man body wishing only to sink in his fat and sleep there. Yet, everytime it happened he managed to recover himself before Cristiano could notice him doing and so, without arousing any suspicion. Yet, it was becoming increasingly hard to just watch the fattening of the soccer player without any of his participation.

Cristiano, instead, was pushing himself more and more to increase his own mass, still delusional about what effect that diet was really having on his body. No matter how hard he found it, he constantly pushed himself to consume always more than the day before. In his mind were engraved the words of his fiancée, which wanted him to grow bigger and stronger than ever before.

With this objective in his mind it wasn’t long before he…
1241111112222441.title: Growing to be the Biggest Star around...

choices: Sergio Aguero, pass him as infected and fatten him up too
Lionel Messi, bind and gag him. Find out why he’s there
Philippe Coutinho, force him to stay around. Hypnotize him to be a feedee.
12411111122224414.content:
With all the food that Cristiano was being fed with and all the addictive chemicals he was taking, it wasn’t really a surprise for Podrick when he realized that having Cristiano satisfied from his huger was a nearly impossible task. From the beginning James had done all he could to maximize the soccer player laziness and gluttony and he finally had managed it. The problem now was to try and keep Cristiano satisfied.

This was a problem he hadn’t imagined before, and yet, between the liquid meals and the constant assistance from the two girls, everything seemed to be feasible. Cristiano itself had started growing once more, growing bigger than ever, even losing his normal humanoid shape in the process. The ex-player in fact had begun growing so fast that his body couldn’t really keep up. Apart from his head, which had also softened, the rest of his body seemed to be growing fatter every minute, giving him a blobby and flabby appearance. Already his head had begun drowning in a sea of flabby chins, as his body grew wider and larger.

His moobs, for example, had grown hugely, spread apart on to each side of him they touched the ground near his bed, with aureole’s as big as platters. His belly then cascaded down onto him, covering almost all his body, with only his swollen feet emerging barely from under it. That tent like gut also stood proud and high, divided in four large belly rolls, since it was becoming difficult to have it filled up. Finally, his hips and ass, there the gain had also been astonishing, giving to the ultra-obese player cheeks so much filled with fat that any kind of movement sent them into a jiggling frenzy.

James knew it was almost time to finish it with Cristiano and yet, he postponed it, thinking that maybe he could grow some more before reaching his final size. What he didn’t know was that all this delay was going to present him, soon, with a difficult choice.

A couple of days later, as James was busy impersonating Georgina and fawning over the still over-confident Cristiano through the VR internet connection, the door to Cristiano’s room opened as someone entered slowly, as to not disturb the ill player. This person, though his intentions had been all in the right places, didn’t realize of the dangers he was exposing himself to.

For as he stepped inside, he initially saw only a couple of hot girls dressed as maids, a strange looking machine in the middle of the room and a rather large bed completely covered in a huge mass of some kind of gelatinous brown-ish thing. Perplexed, the person turned around and verifying that he was indeed in the right room, he realized with a start, that there was a large hose connected into the jelly-like mass, pumping who knows what inside of it.

But then, after a few seconds, he also realized that the hose wasn’t only pumping that thing up…it was also that thig that was gulping down whatever substance the hose was bringing.

This realization forced his troubled mind to really see what he was looking at.

That brownish mass, so jiggly and flabby, was in truth a human being. Someone so hugely fattened that had completely lost any resemblance to a normal human shape.

And since he was in the room of the soccer player under the name of Cristiano Ronaldo, the one who had fell ill long time before, it was rather quickly that he realized who that human being was, even though it was unrecognizable.

“C-Cristiano…!?”

As the person shouted that name, Podrick was forced to close the connection hastily with Ronaldo, hastily making up some excuses with his Georgina character, and hurried through his bedroom door to the main room where Cristiano was, realizing that someone had just entered.

As he saw the guy he didn’t recognized him immediately, James had bigger problems than that. He had now to figure out a way to keep the intruder mouth shut, while keeping the news of the fat Cristiano from being spread around. In truth there were a few methods to do that, and hastily he acted toward them as he approached the guy from behind and knocked him out.

As the intruder fell to the floor unconscious, James had finally time to see who it was and, based on that, on how to keep him quiet…
12411111122224414.title: Relentless hunger

choices: Force on him huge portions of food and the no exericses regimen
Use loads of appetite stimulants on him, causing him to feel constantly hungry
He’s called ‘El Kun’? Change him into a real caveman. a FAT one...
Take it slow on him. Let Aguero feel confident and then crush him unexpectedly
124111111222244141.content:
As James realized that it was another quite famous soccer payer that had intruded on Cristiano sanctuary, he knew that he had a very limited choice of option in dealing with him. The most obvious, and the most satisfactory for him, was to force the new guest to stay there with them, to be fattened just like Cristiano.

There were only a few problems with that plan. First he had to figure out why the guy had come and for which reason he was in the building. Then he also had to make sure that he had contacts in high enough places to cover for the disappearance of the new soccer player. Swiftly he began to pace around the room while making calls.

When the sun had begun to set on the horizon James had finally managed to solve most of the situation. Thanks to some blackmailing and to the calling of old debts, he had managed to make it so that Sergio Aguero would be considered infected with the same illness of Cristiano, forcing him so to remain there along with the other player to try and cure himself. Always under James guidance.

He also managed to find out why the guy was roaming in their building.

The player had heard of Cristiano illness and had wanted to visit to just comfort the player. James almost laughed out loud at the ingenuity of his new guest. Yet, there was one last problem that had to be solved.

Space.

Already with Cristiano in his current condition there was barely space to move around, if James were to add another player, the room wouldn’t surely be enough. So it was time for renovations since they couldn’t move Cristiano from where he was, due to his huge size. Was it expensive? Yes, but the company that James contacted was renowned for their capacity of keeping a secret so, not one of the workers that came to bring down one of the walls, to merge Cristiano’s room with the following one, said anything as they worked in record time to provide the enlargement requested by Podrick.

In less than three days, James’s Sanctuary was now large enough to host two people of Cristiano size and, since Cristiano did nothing but being stuffed with his gain shake, there was room and time to take care of Sergio Aguero.


The soccer player, woke up rather groggily feeling as if he hadn’t had a single drop of water and/or food in the last few days, which was actually true since James had been forced to keep him pharmacologically sedated. But now that he was awake, he blearily looked around trying to figure out where he was.

Last thing he remembered was seeing a hugely mass of jiggly jelly which, at the time, he had thought to be Cristiano Ronaldo.

As he tried to get his bearing, he realized he was strapped down to a bed, unable to move. Just as he was going to scream for help, he saw a figure approaching him.

“Who are you? Why am I strapped to this bed? Where are we?”

“Mr. Aguero. I’ deeply sorry of having to make your acquaintance in this way but we had no other choice.”

James spoke with a grave tone in his voice, trying to make it sound as if something very wrong had happened.

“I’ll try to explain things to you calmly but first, you need to have something to drink. I’ve been given this serum which will provide your body with the basic nutrients needed for a fast recovery…”

As he said that he moved, closer to Aguero, an unmarked container with a straw emerging from the top.

Sergio began slowly to suck from the straw, accelerating his pace as soon as the liquid passed on his taste buds. James smiled within himself, please to see that yet another player trusted him completely just because he had the face of a simple man.

While it was true that the shake was full of nutrients, it also had some of the chemicals he had used to facilitate the fattening of Cristiano. As Aguero kept drinking, Podrick continued to explain the situation to the player.

“You see, as you probably know Cristiano Ronaldo has fallen prey to a strange illness which had forced him to retire from the scene. What you probably didn’t know is that this malady is also mildly infective.

I was chosen to take care of him due to my immunity to the illness but, as you entered in contact with him…”

Here Aguero, which had quite rapidly consumed all the content of the provided container, began to close his eyes, already knowing what the guy in front of him was going to say.

“Since the encounter, you have been tested and the results indicate you’re positive to the illness. I’m truly sorry but, you must remain here and follow the treatment as we try to have you avoid the same fate of Cristiano.”

James then, seeing as Aguero had begun to lick his lips quite often, while being completely unaware of the slight rounding out of his stomach, rapidly offered him another unmarked container, this time filled with a home-made gain-shake.

“Here, sir. Have some more of it. Doctors told me you may have a craving for it at first...it should pass in a couple of days...”

The player, still unable to move began drinking once more, stopping only once to ask a question to James, before returning to his drinking, still unaware of the effects that drinking all of that gain shake was going to have on his athletic body.

“Thanks. So, who are you and what’s going to happen to me?”

“I’m James Podrick, former coach of Cristiano and now his caretaker. You’re in a wing of the quarantined area.

From here on out you’ll be staying here following the treatment that the higher up decided for you to follow. One thing I can guarantee you is that you won’t have any contact with the outside world, since nobody has to know about this situation.”

As Podrick continued to speak, Sergio assumed a more relaxed stance, as the intense hunger he had felt in the pit of his stomach was getting abated by whatever he was drinking. Still he began to grow worried once more when he heard James talking about the loss of contact from the outside world.

“Wh…*hurff*…What do you mean? I...*urp* whew...that stuff sure is good...But, you mean I can’t contact ...my family while I’m here?”

“Sorry, but any contact is denied. Your family will be informed by the company legal representative.
Now, if everything is clear I’m going to untie you but I reiterate. You’ll have to follow what they tell me to have you follow.”

In the following days, Sergio was able to stand freely in his room, although he couldn’t leave it, not even to talk with his fellow player Ronaldo. That was bothering him but what troubled him the most was that he had still cravings for that strane shake thing he had been offered when he woke up. Not that it tasted bad, the problem was the opposite. As he drank it he felt like he could keep drinking it for months, and that scared him a little. True Podrick had warned about that but, lately, he was finding hiself wishing to always have more of it.

It didn’t make any sense to him that he wanted more of that thing, since he was feeling well but, as his caretake had said to him once “The issue is that also Cristiano said the same some time ago. At that time the company didn’t press the issue…and now you’ve seen the results.”.

So, although it made him mad that he had to abandon his vegan lifestyle, he kept drinking that shake, even though he noticed that, somehow, instead of reducing the quantities, they seemed to be giving him always more than the last time.

James, as he was secretly spying his new guest through hidden cameras, could only smile as he saw the player dig into the new oversized pitcher of Gain-Shake that one of the maids had brought upon him. If with Cristiano he had to be pushy and force the player to follow the ‘Diet’, with Aguero things were easier. After all, Sergio didn’t want to share the same fate of Cristiano and so complied immediately. Probably they could pass him the full gallon size of gain shake before placing him on the fattening diet that forced Cristiano to stay in bed all the time...

James had only to decide what to do with his new test subject…
124111111222244141.title: Sergio Aguero unexpected prolongued visit

choices: Pushing Aguero & Meal making Cristiano. New Footballers to join?
Checking Aguero & Consuming Cristiano, maybe his meat is addictive?
Pushing both players to grow. Show Aguero his fate by mingling with Cristiano
1241111112222441411.content:
In the following days the situation of Sergio Aguero become to return to a semblance of normality.

He no longer ad cravings for that nutrient shakes, but still he kept consuming it in large quantities, and he himself began to see his staying there as an extended vacation. For that reason, he began to pass his days laying on the bed, watching television and doing not much else. As James saw that the guy had started to relax, he knew it was the perfect time to strike.

With four days of permanence in the quarantined area, James entered the room where Aguero was staying, he kept a grave expression to let him understand that the situation was dire.

“Mr.Aguero?”

The player was currently laying on the bed, watching a tv show, but he turned the TV off and moved his gaze on his caretaker.

“Yeah? And call me Sergio, please…”

“Alright. Sergio, I’ve just received new directives regarding your stay here and the illness you’ve found yourself subjected to. Basically, the Medical division has given me a plan that you’ve got to be following with extreme precision. I’m truly sorry about this.”

Aguero didn’t say anything for a log while then, suddenly he burst out laughing.

“C’mon, Man! I’m not dead yet. You’re just too serious…What is it? They already have taken me out of any exercise. This is basically a vacation…so, no worries man.”

As the player took the meal plan that James was bringing him, his expression first seemed shocked, then seemed to be growing angry and finally showed simply acceptance.

“So, they want me to follow his massive diet, uh? Well, what to do…If that’s what they want.
I’ll just lose the extra weight as soon as I’m out of here. No point in wasting time, bring it on and I’ll chow it down.”

From that morning Aguero began to follow the massive meal plan that Podrick had brought to him, starting to eat almost constantly throughout the day. At first the guy seemed to show a little of resistance but, after a few meals, he simply began to lay back and accept whatever it was brought to him. Podrick couldn’t believe how easy it seemed to be. Even now, as he was watching Aguero going through his third breakfast, devouring it with a voraciousness that he had never seen before, the guy kept eating without a single complaint.

Even when his belly began to bloat outward, over the shorts he was wearing, he didn’t voice a single peep.

And in the following days the situation remained unchanged, Sergio Aguero kept swallowing whatever they brought him and, naturally, his body began to absorb all those calories turning them into fat. 12422233333233232233222.title: Angelina Jolie

choices: Joao Kingstone (Deceit, lies and weight gain)
124222333332332322332221.content:
Angelina Jolie was sitting in her couch, enjoying a break from her latest movie in her mansion in Los Angeles. She had been so focused on her career that she had a nearly mental breakdown and, with her husband away filming a movie in New Zealand, she had needed to just rest somewhere while doing absolutely nothing.

And still, even though she had warned her collaborators of her break, people kept calling and disturbing her relentlessly.

All of this could not go on.

“…Therefore, I was calling, Frank. I can’t go on like this. You’re my manager, what do you suggest?”

“Well, Angie. The answer is easy. Hire a personal assistant to take care of this load from you. If you want, I know someone who could fill this spot easily…or, as I know you like to do charity for the third world countries, I’ve heard of a new agency born in west Africa.

Congo, I believe.

I heard around that they’re good and trying to get their name known worldwide. Anyway, give me five and I’ll send you both the CV’s of my contacts and the agency internet site so you can check and decide.”

Angelina mulled it over for a couple of hours, she quickly scanned the CV of the person forwarded by her Manager, but she was fascinated by the idea of helping out to an African agency.

In the end she went and checked their site and remained very surprised in finding out how professional and prepared they seemed to be. As she scanned their site, she saw exactly how the process would start.
She was to provide details on the job and the location, then the agency would forward a selection of their employees selected exactly to her specification, for her to choose which one she would prefer.

Finding herself getting excited she quickly filled out the requester form, providing as much information as she could, finding herself quite surprised when a chat-box opened informing her than an operator was going to contact her right away.

“Good Morning Miss Jolie. I’m Joao Cumbu, your referral for the purpose of hiring one of ours employees.”

Gingerly, Angelina began typing away on her keyboard.

“Good Morning Mr. Cumbu. I actually wasn’t expecting such an immediate response.”

“Miss, it’s our pledge to be of service to those who are in need, especially considering your case. With how much you’ve done for our countries how could we not give you our best?
No, Miss, it’s an honor to serve.”

As the discussion progressed, Angelina began to have a better understanding on how things were going to work out and, a few minutes later, she was already checking the CV’s they had sent to her.

First one was a middle-aged man, named Felipe Mbutu. He seemed to be quite a big guy, almost seven feet tall with a quite impressive amount of muscles on his body. He was supposed to be able to speak three languages, including English and French, and apparently was a masterful Chef with a degree taken in an institute in France.

Second one was also a male, quite young-ish. From his picture, Joao Kingstone, seemed quite the sly guy. While not as broad as the one before him he still seemed to be quite toned. Also, he was able to speak three languages, including English and Portuguese, and while he was able to cook, he wasn’t a real chef. But he had under his special characteristics section marked himself as a fitness therapist.

Last one was a girl, Felicia Joao Macunda. She appeared like a thirty-something, bubbly, little thing, staring at the camera with a happy smile on her face. As the other two she also was an expert in the latest software and had mastered the English language, but she also had remarkably good organizational and household’s managerial skills.

As Angelina checked their CV’s her eyes fell once more on the list of names provided to her by her Manager, wondering if she should try with this agency or if maybe could be better to ask Frank to find someone capable.

Meanwhile, in the Headquarters of the Agency Angelina was in contact with, Joao Cumbu was giving the news to his staff members, with a smile plastered to his face.

“Good News everyone! We may have a new Client that will bring fame and fortune to our Tribe and Company!
As of now, the world-renowned actress Angelina Jolie is taking into consideration to hire some of our brightest to help her as personal assistant. Now, it was decided that three of you had to be chosen as candidates and, while it was difficult, the Elders reached a decision…”

As all the employees stood from their chairs, turned toward their Manager and Tribe Leader, a total silence fell into the room, until it was broken by Cumbu who announced the three chosen.

“Felipe Mbutu! As a Shaman for our tribe you are the most competent in the culinary skills, so if she chooses to have you, it will be your duty to fatten her up to epic proportion so to let our Tribe able to feast on her bounties for months!

Joao Kingstone! As our Lead Hunter who better than you to feign innocence and get her to do whatever you wish? And don’t worry about food. America is one of the most fattening places on earth, all considered.

Last, but not the least, our beloved Felicia Macunda!
You, have always acted as our bait to lure the foolish into our hands, letting them feel comfortable around you as you fed them to immobility and beyond. Do the Teeth Gnasher Tribe proud, child, and bring back to us enough Angelina to have an endless feast!”


Angelina then decided to hire…
124222333332332322332221.title: Cannibal Personal Assistant

1242223333323323223322211.content:
A few weeks later, after all documents had been processed, Felipe finally reached his destination, entering through the main gate of Angelina Mansion. He had already been briefed on his duties, both officially and unofficially, all that remained was to meet the employer.

The meeting between them went on cordially, from the start Angelina requested to keep things informal and throughout the day she began pouring on Felipe all the information needed for him to perform his duties. In all that time Felipe made up a show for Angelina, to show her his capabilities leaving her impressed regarding her new hired assistant.

“Wow, Felipe. You sure are something else. You’ve done a terrific job today. I’m really glad you’ve come.”

“It’s a pleasure to serve one such as you. You’ve helped my people a lot in the past, it feels right to help you back. On this note, I was wondering if I could prepare you dinner? Just to show you how much I appreciate working here for you.”

Angelina, feeling rather embarrassed, couldn’t do much more than nod, and so as she remained sprawled on the couch, watching her television, Felipe was busying himself around the kitchen.

“So, what’s going to be on the menu, tonight?”

“Oh, Miss. I’m going to show you a taste of Africa!”

‘Oh yes. You’ll see Angelina. Not for nothing I’m the shaman of my tribe. Nobody knows as much as me about herbs and spices. I’ll make you a meal that will place you right where I want you to be.’



Later, we find Angelina asleep on her couch while the television keeps on babbling about. She’s enjoying the peaceful rest and, somewhat ruefully, she wakes up hearing the voice of her assistant calling to her.

“Miss? Miss, dinner’s ready. Miss…?”

“Hmm...What time is it? Oh, Felipe? It’s already time for dinner? You should have woken me up.”

“Miss was sleeping so peacefully; I couldn’t force myself to wake her up before everything was ready.”

Slowly she rose from the couch and walked toward the dining room, but upon entering the room she stood on the doorway speechless. On the table there wasn’t, literally, an inch of free space that wasn’t occupied by some plate or dish prepared by her assistant.

“Wow…F-Felipe? Did you invite an army for dinner? That is way too much food only for me.”

“Well, I actually didn’t mean to prepare this much but, I wanted to thank you for the chance you’re giving me.”

Still smiling, appreciating the gesture, the actress sat at the table, inviting her assistant to join her, as she still looked dumbfounded at the quantity of food spread out on the table.

“Uhm…From which dish we should start?”

“Oh, let me, Miss. Here, this is a typical stew from the ancestors of the south of Africa. It is prepared with various cuts of meat, potatoes, onions and some banana’s peels…”

As Felipe kept going in describing the recipe, he also poured a substantial amount in Angelina’s plate, adding in the end a bit of spice he had with himself, making sure that the actress wasn’t watching.

As Angelina tried the stew her expression changed. A smile a mile wide appeared on her face, as she began to consume eagerly the stew, feeling as it spread a pleasurable heat within her body. Even though it wasn’t a small portion, the actress polished it off in a matter of minutes as she began to let her hungry star wander around the table.

“Here, you could try some of this…”

He said moving a plate with a perfectly cooked steak and some roasted onions toward the actress.

“This one has been prepared through an old family recipe. After preparing the steak, before placing it on the stove to be cooked, you let it rest a few minutes within some palm trees bark, letting the aroma from the tree bark to flow into the meat…”

For the following hour Angelina found herself unable to stop eating. Everything tasted so good that she couldn’t stop, even if she wanted to. Still, even though lots of food was still on the table, as soon as Felipe judged that the actress was nearly full, he intervened and stopped her.

“Miss? Is getting late…Since tomorrow will be a busy day wouldn’t be best if…”

The actress stopped herself just as she was grabbing some more bread buns from the table and, gulping down her bite, she let out a small giggle.

“You’re right, Felipe. Still, all my compliments. Everything was perfect. If it isn’t too much trouble, would you mind…?”

The shaman grinned wickedly as he nodded to the request.

“But of course, Miss. It will be my pleasure to prepare all of your meals if that is your wish...”

“Yeah…everything tasted divine…If I weren’t so full, I may still have something else…”

The shaman smiled inwardly, thinking back to the spice he had used. It was a rare combination of herbs that in the tribe was often used to help their meals to willingly fatten themselves up. Not only was it odorless and tasteless, but it was highly addictive, and it also acted as a slight hunger enhancement.

Felipe chuckled within himself as he saw Angelina Jolie walk away from the dining room cradling her stuffed belly, and he couldn't stop himself from imagining how would she look like a few months in the future if he could manage to plan all of her meals and daily activities.
