12422233333233232233223131.title: brad pitt and angelina jolie

124222333332332322332231313.content:
The married couple Pitt/Jolie had been married for a long time now, but as of late the two were having almost constant fights with each other, often followed by a temporary reconciliation. Still the two of them did love each other and wanted to find a more permanent solution.

While checking on the internet they suddenly saw an AD for a counsellor, which seemed to have a huge amount of fans and followers.

After a quick search and confirmation of the info on the guy, they took an appointment and went with it.

A week later, the two of them entered his studio and seated on the couch as they waited for the guy to start their session. The Doctor’s name tag Recited ‘Dr. Sweet’ and he seemed quite the average Joe. The only thing that stood out on him was a strange glint in his eyes, a glint that some people seemed to find unnerving.

Apart for that, all reviews about him were extremely positive.

As he entered and sat on a small couch right opposite to the married couple he smled as he greeted them.

“Good Morning Mister Pitt, Miss Jolie. I’m Philodendron Sweet, but you may simply call me Phil. Now, I would like to keep this as informal as possible, if that is okay with you.”

The couple silently nodded with each other, at which the doctor smiled back.

“That’s good. Already from this I can see you’ve been a loving couple from many years. But it does seem you’re having some issues lately. Don’t worry though. We’ll find a solution, together.”

As they started to delve deeper and deeper into the issues that the couple was facing, the doctor began to formulate a plan on how to solve the situation with his new clients and to solve a minor matter that had been persecuting him lately.

You see, Philodendron had always been a different child. He had grown in a family that considered the rest of mankind as nothing more than an additional source of food. Growing up he was taught that to enjoy the taste of the human flesh was a good thing, something that most should have given out freely. But apparently he hadn’t ever found anybody who wanted to share their personal bounty and so he had to reinvent himself to satisfy this need he had.

It was for this that he decided one day to study the behavior of the human mind and, after mastering various degrees, he opened up his studio.

Helping people pair up…and then chewing’em down.

The two celebrities in front of him were going to be the icing on his figurative cake. He had just to let them grow together, both in happiness and in size, and then he could finally see if fame made the flesh taste better…just like a normal steak and one prepared by a gourmand were two different worlds apart.

After a bit of discussion, being able to discern that the two of them were simply having a normal issue with their own respective careers, he decided the best course of action for them.

“Brad, Angelina. I’ll be sincere. The two of you look perfect together but you’re letting your own greed getting in the way of your relationship.

I personally say that there is an easy solution to try to solve this and prevent any further fights between you.

You should try to take a breath of rest from your own careers, for a while at least, and following a specific schedule that I will prepare based on the information you’ve given me, you shall try to rest, relax and enjoy life together.

To have a better effect, I would suggest following you on a more personal level. By living with you and helping you on this journey. You will see that in no time you two will return to the best time of your relationship.

Would it be acceptable for you?

Otherwise we could find some other solutions. I could follow you one by one, but it would require a longer period. Or maybe, I can give you two some different objectives, thus forcing you to decide which you prefer best, if the objective or your true love.”

1242223333323323223322313131.content:
Brad and Angelina looked at each other for a moment, whispering between them for a few minutes but, in the end, they decided to try it and so gave their confirmation.

The following week we find the married couple sitting at their kitchen table, reading out from a report that Dr. Sweet had prepared for them, giving directions and pointers to what their weekly schedule were going to be, both Brad and Angelina read on with a quizzical look on their face, as they began discussing the schedule with the good doctor, who sat near them sipping a small cup of coffee.

“So, Phil…?”

“Yes. Brad?”

“Err…I get the whole ‘no work for a month’ thing but also no exercises? No workouts? Nothing at all?”

“You see, Brad, we are trying to bring peace and quiet within the two of you. Exercises bring the idea of competition and, through that, anger toward the less performing of the two of you. We do not need that. So, no work, no exercises, no workouts.

Just rest and restful activities that you can do as a couple.

Yes, Angelina?”

“Yeah…I was wondering…er, is this meal plan accurate? I mean, six meals per day doesn’t sound…too much?”

“That is a common misconception. It doesn’t matter what you eat but how often you eat. See, to reach an easier peace of the mind, you’ve got to be able to concentrate on what’s really important. By eating often, you give your body a constant intake of energies that will grant you additional resources to reach the bliss. Otherwise your body would have to spend precious energies to always be on the lookout to satisfy its hunger.”

For almost half an hour the married celebrities kept on discussing with the doctor but, in the end, they had to accept all his proposals. They were a bit worried about this turn in their lifestyle but, in the end, as they started following the schedule they both began to grow more and more complacent as time passed.

During that week the two of them didn’t do much more that wake up late, watch television together, sleep together and, of course, eat.

As they followed Dr. Phil’s diet of six meals a day, with a constant stream of snacks out of the mealtimes, it was no wonder that both their bodies began requesting more than what they were currently having. Still, in that week, both Brad and Angie, noticed that there were no fights, no arguments but a simple calm and acceptance of what was going on around them.

Phil followed the two celebrities all week, watching them from afar, pushing them from time to time in the correct direction…toward gluttony. And the results were promising so far.

Neither of the two had gained that much in that simple week but, it was normal. Phil knew that the week he had instructed them to follow was necessary to instigate their bodies to start slowing down their metabolism and to get them used to eating more. And that they had done.

As the new week began Phil made sure to be always reachable and, while doing so, to always have time to provide a few more detailed suggestion or instruction to his client. That morning, for example, as he was brewing some coffee in the kitchen he saw Brad coming down from their master bedroom and sit at the table beside him, while ordering around their servant to prepare him a hearty breakfast.

“Consuelo? Please, could you make me a few eggs with fried bacon? Four or five eggs should be enough… Oh, Hi Phil. How’s going?”

“Good Morning Brad. Well, shouldn’t be I to make that question to you? It’s fine, although, I wish I could see some better results from the two of you.”

As Brad began eating from the big plate he had received, he looked quizzically toward the doctor seated beside him.

“You see, Brad…Usually in the first week the couples grow closer through a common objective. You two instead are still on the ‘Finding your own peace’ moment. However, that’s okay, we will try to make your next week’s more relaxing.

Moreover, since we’re talking of this…I’ve been thinking of increasing your daily regime a little bit. As a couple you guys are way too singlehandedly active. That isn’t good. For this reason I’m going to implement some required nap time that the two of you will have to follow together.”

“But, Phil, how could we do that? If I haven’t need for any sleep how would I…?”

“Easy. Let Dr. Sweet work on it. You’ll soon see.”

That morning, as Brad and Agelina sat on the couch together, watching some tv shows, trying to follow the schedule from their doctor, their servants brought them their snacks for the mid-morning, but both watched stunned as their usual small bowls of snack was replaced with a large Devil Food’s cake for Brad and a large apple pie for Angelina.

As the two looked at the massive treat, Philodendron appeared behind them with a smile.

“Now, guys, you need to relax. To do so, you will eat some snacks until the both of you feel sleepy. This way, you will snuggles beside each other and move forward toward the peace and calm you so desire.

I already instructed your servants about this, so don’t worry about a thing. Just eat, sleep and relax.

Everything will be taken care of.”

‘Oh yes. Soon the two of you will get used to gorge all the time…I can’t wait to see it happens…’
1242223333323323223322313131.title: Philodendron in the house!

12422233333233232233223131311.content:
It was near the end of the second week since Brad and Angelina had started to follow the advice from Dr. Sweet, and the two of them had never been as happy before.

As the clock ringed both woke up with a yawn, Brad was the first to rise to a sitting position, while scratching the beginning of a potbelly he was developing, while Angelina kept low on the bed but wide awake. Not a minute had passed since the clock ringing that their room door opened letting in two of their servants. These brought with them two tray, one for each actor, with their first pre-breakfast.

As both celebrities sat in their bed, they quickly accepted their trays and happily started digging in.

Brad began taking bite after bite at his large portion of fried eggs and bacon, washing it all down with the thick vanilla milkshake, his portion had been steadily growing since the previous week, reaching now a size that could have fed two normal people. Yet, Brad felt he could trust the good doctor advice and so didn’t see anything wrong in its size.
Angelina instead licked her lips as she surveyed her own pre-breakfast, it had been constantly changing in the last week but, apparently it had finally settled on a constant barrage of sweets. In front of her, in fact, there was a large bowl filled with chocolate brownies, a couple of large muffins and a big plate with a particularly large slice of devil’s food cake, with a side of three dollops of ice cream.

Both celebrities did a quick work of both trays and, as soon as they were cleaned, the two maid quickly took the tray’s away, leaving the two celebrities to rise from the bed, to prepare themselves for the continuation of the day. With a belly full of sweets, Angelina was the first one to rise and, as she did every morning, she began her day by taking a quick shower and then wear her usual attire for the day. A pair of short shorts in spandex, with matching sports bra. As it had become usual, she quickly inspected herself, noticing that she had become a bit softer than before but, with her new relaxed attitude she simply dismissed the thought and went on with her day.

Brad was in a similar position, after dressing up in a pair of sweater pants and shirt, he gave himself a good look in the mirror. He flexed a bit his slightly flabbier body and, as per instruction received he knew that by being bigger he was going to be stronger. As he finished, he too, left the room and followed his wife down toward the kitchen where their true breakfast was awaiting them, along with the good doctor.

As the two of them were seated at the kitchen table Doctor Phil smiled and greeted them, while sipping a bit of coffee, as they began to consume the first proper meal of the day. Brad, seated at one end of the table, happily munched on a dozen hot dogs, as he kept staring at both his wife and to his next plate, chocked full of fried bacon and sausages.

Beside him, always within reach, there were a couple of tall glasses full with an energy drink, spiked with some spoonful of bulk up powder.

Opposite to him sat Angelina, she too was rapidly consuming quite a large breakfast while feeling decidedly content in refilling her belly with the food she was starting to get addicted to. In front of her there were several plates, the nearest ones were full of fluffy pancakes drowned in syrup and butter, then there were a few more with chocolate covered waffles and finally a large platter with half of a massive chocolate cake covered in frosting.

Angelina smiled toward Phil as she began to dug in the delicious food. She had shown some resistance at the beginning but, as the doctor pointed out, she had to live more relaxed to return to her old love life.

Plus, she was beginning to enjoy following that diet.

As they both cleaned out their respective plates, both actors lay on their chairs panting slightly. As it was becoming a normal occurrence, both felt tired after eating their breakfast and always needed some minutes to just recover from it. Their bodies though began rapidly to digest and process all the food they had consumed, something that Phil loved to be able to see right in front of his eyes.
Still, after a few minutes rest, the two quite bloated celebrities slowly waddled toward the couch where they would spend most of their day. Sitting there, side by side, they began to watch some shows on the TV, as their maids began bringing them some snack every few minutes. Distracted by the shows Brad kept chowing down on all snacks that he received from the maids, chewing noisily on hot dogs and burgers and sloppily drinking soda after soda. Angelina, seated right beside him, wasn’t in a better position.

She too was so focused on the TV that she barely registered on how much she was eating, filling her mouth with more and more chocolaty snacks and treats. The maids, from their side, weren’t aware of what was going on but, as they had been ordered to follow the Doctor’s indication they simply did as he said.

And so for most of the morning the married couple kept on guzzling down food and drinks as they kept watching the television until, usually, Brad began to feel sleepy. It was at that moment that Phil, always checking on the two, proceeded to increase the quantities delivered to Angelina which, with more food on her hands, simply began to consume it faster and faster until she simply crumbled, falling asleep right beside her husband.

Leaving the two stuffed love birds napping for almost an hour, Phil began to organize for their next main meal of the day. Lunch.

As soon as the hour had passed, the maid went and began to wake up the two bloated celebrities, urging them to rise from the couch and, almost, pushing them to the dining room were their first lunch awaited.

Both Brad and Angelina, even though were still feeling somewhat full, couldn’t deny that they were growing addicted to the constant gorging and so, without too much of a fight, both began to eat once more. If they hadn’t been so focused on stuffing themselves to the fullest both could have noticed that their dietary regimen, apart from the sheer quantities, were very strange. Brad seemed to be following an all carbs and protein diet, with all of his meals consisting mostly in meats and baked breads. While Angelina was more on a carbs and sugar diet, being given for the most parts sweets and sugary treat and beverages.

Both celebrities tough, didn’t seem to mind how much they were eating, especially since they were so focused on eating that they didn’t seem to realize how much of it they were pushing down in their gullets.

It was at that moment, as the two were enthralled by their full six course meals that Doctor Phil began, as he did every day, to lay an additional insurance to have the two actors steadily growing bigger and fatter.

“Brad…” Phil began, whispering softly in the man ear, as he was still focused on eating away at the large one pounder burger in front of him.

“Brad…Keep going Brad. Keep eating.
Remember…the more you eat, the more you grow…the bigger you are, the stronger you’ll become.

And look at her, Brad…isn’t she beautiful? How could a skinny little thing like you stay with her…unless you grow bigger and stronger…

Be strong, Brad…be the biggest for her…”

The words, the tone, everything in Phil voice was calculated to impact on Brad subconsciousness, to force him to see the world as Philodendron wanted him to see it. Brad, focused as he was, couldn’t do much but listen to that voice and turn his world around it. Convincing himself that what the voice said was true.

After working his magic on Brad, Phil moved on Angelina.

“Angie…you’re such a good girl. Aren’t you, Angie?

But good girls will eat what they have on their plate. Eat Angie, eat and enjoy.
Remember, food is good. Exercise is bad.
Look at Brad, he’s awesome, isn’t he? But he’s like that because he eats his food.

Eat up, Angie. Remember, eating makes you grow more beautiful…the more you eat the more amazing you become…”

As soon as lunch finished, Brad and Angelina collapsed right where they were. Huffing and puffing, both celebrities felt good, due to Phil’s hypnotical suggestions, but as it was becoming a common occurrence, they both couldn’t move an inch. Brad leaned back on his chair, slowly and carefully caressing his overburdened belly. Forced to open up the zip of his sweater shirt he laid there breathing slowly as the literal weight of all the food consumed kept him from moving. Angelina, seated opposite from him, didn’t fare much better. Sure, she was wearing clothes more comfortable, without feeling them grow tight on her belly, but with the compulsion instilled in her by Phil, even though she was feeling full she kept on eating, trying with all of her resolve to lick clean her plates. Eventually though, she stopped and collapsed in a similar pose to her husband.

Slowly and carefully, as they were still full and overstuffed, they rose from their chairs and, helped along by their maids, they moved to their master bedroom, where they passed some time together. At first, they spent that time cuddling together…but as the days passed and their forms began to grow bigger and fuller, the two of them began to spend that time by sleeping and digesting together.

And yet, as this was the end of the second week, Philodendron wanted more from them... But what could he do with them?

Possibilities were endless…

“Caroline…I’m…I’m Full! Can’t…keep…going…”

Brad was laying on the couch, unable to move due to how full his belly was. His gut was filled out, a huge round balloon that forced him to lay there with his legs spreaded out. “*Urp!* Urgh…too much…can’t have anymore…”

A couple of pies later, Sarah felt the tautness in Angelina’s gut and motioned to stop but, felt the hand of the actress on her wrist.

The maid looked at the beached whale in front of her. She didn’t know why both she and her husband had decided to follow such a fattening diet, but it wasn’t her place to discuss it. Returning to the present, she looked down at her mistress and, seeing that she truly wanted more she simply grabbed another piece from a sheet cake and brought it to her lips.

“Here you go, Miss…”

Angelina happily accepted the treat, moaning in pleasure from both the pain and the taste.

Philodendron was watching the scene from the camera feed. This was an unexpected result, and yet he wasn’t going to refuse it. He didn’t expect it from Angelina to grow attached to the feeling of being overfull, but he for sure was going to take advantage of it.

In the following weeks the gain for both the actors kept increasing steadily, as they slowly got used to the new portions and, as such, they had to be stuffed even more to reach the objective of stretching their stomaches. Angelina especially was growing at an astounding rate, quickly surpassing 250 pounds in less than three months, while Brad was still getting used to be slightly less than that. Phil could see the strain in Brad, the toll that doing something simple as talking was taking out of him. It was yet another milestone in Phil’s book regarding the growth of his two patients/future meals.

And still, Brad wasn’t wrong.

For when both he and his wife were gone, changed into massive food reserve for Philodendron, he would have to find something else to keep him be. Instead, if he could fatten up the servitude and, why not?, even some friends of the couple, he could stock on his favorite food for a long time.

“Well, Brad, this does you honor. To be worried as you are about your employees, shows how good natured you are. Angelina’s lucky to have you. Anyway, I’ll have a chat with her and try to convince her to follow a diet for a healthier lifestyle.”

“Thanks…Doc…appreciate…it.”

“Don’t mention it, Brad. After all is my job to keep the two of you happy and together.”

As soon as the other maids moved Brad back in the main bedroom, right alongside his wife, Phil called to him Christie, having her seat in front of him.

“So, Christie? How’s going with Brad?”

“I’m doing all I can to have him keep on eating as much as possible. As long you keep your part of the agreement, I will follow your instructions.”

As she said that Phil smiled wickedly. He had hired her to woo Brad only because he had found a leverage to keep her lashed to him. And that leverage was none other than Christie’s own family. The poor girl knew that her family, specifically her mother, was having financial issues and so Phil had volunteered to keep her secure at the cost of her help. It wasn’t the nicest of things to do to trick your own employer but, she didn’t have any other choice.

“I know you’re doing all you can, Christie, but there is something you could actually do to speed up things.”

“What is it? What more could I do?”

“Simple. From tomorrow, you shall be placed on a similar bed and keep him company from there. As if you were following their same diet.”

“What!? Are you crazy? I won’t be fattened up like them!”

Phil smiled sinisterly as he looked at the young girl.

“First, I won’t have you fatten up. Second, you don’t really have a choice, do you? Or you’re ready to maintain your mother as well as your brother?”

‘Especially…’ The doctor thought with a wicked grin ‘Since I had her moved on a twelve thousands calories per day diet, since she was moved in my facility.’

“N-No…I guess not. B-But you’re not going to make me grow as them, are you?”

“I’ve told you already, Christina. We’re only going to pretend.
You’ll be fed a tasteless sludge which doesn’t contain that many calories. So you’ll just stay there beside Brad, faking yourself to be following an healthier diet and he will return to his usual addiction.
Trust me.”

The following day, Brad noticed with glee that a new bed was placed beside his own, and on this one was laying his latest crush, Christie. As he saw her lay there, drinking away from a hose placed on her mouth he could easily deduce that the good Doctor had managed to convince her to follow the healthy diet he was following.

Smiling for his success, Brad, began eating faster and faster at whatever his maids were feeding him. Soon, Christie would become perfect sized again and he could finally make love to her without any fear of hurting her.

At the same time, as soon as the sludge entered Christie’s mouth, she realized something for the briefest moment.

For a single fraction of an instant, she realized that whatever was being forced in her mouth through the hose, was tasting divine. And that was worrisome, for the Doctor had said that it should have been tasteless instead. But, as more and more of that sludge was pushed between her lips, Christie soon lost interest in anything else, focusing only on the delicious stuff she was slurping up.

Philodendron looked pleased as he surveyed the master bedroom.

First there was Angelina Jolie, pushing near the 600 pounds, growing so largely pear shaped that her lower half had begun overtaking the bed. Then, next to her, there was Brad. He was now almost always trying to catch a look from Christie, as he was now reaching the 500 pounds and forcing himself to grow more for her lover.

And then, beside him, Christie herself.

Phil had promised her it was all going to be fake…But he had simply lied to her.

She was going to grow just as big, if not bigger, now that she was being getting addicted to the weight gain chemical he had also used on the couple. And so, the good Doctor now had three soon-to-be-meals to feed and prepare for the final moments. Angelina was obviously going to be the first one to go…but before that he needed the two of them alive since…

1242223333323323223322313131111241.content:
Philodendron had first wanted to get the Brad/Angelina for himself but, as time went on and the two had grown way past his expectations, he realized he could start something he had only dreamed before.

Using their mansion as his own base of operations he could now create a place where all who shared his ‘dietary preferences’ could join him and help him along the way.

Naturally, everything still had to be kept under secret but, it was feasible.

As he approached the master bedroom where his three pigs were growing Phil already had formed his plans. Yet, he only needed their confirmation so that he could start using their money to create his paradise. Entering the room, he was glad to see that everything was still under control.

Angelina had slowed on her growth, with almost 650 pounds on her frame it was becoming obvious that solid food wasn’t enough for her growth anymore. Even though she was fed every waking moment, be it willingly or forcing her, she still wasn’t growing as fast as before. No matter that four maids were following her throughout the day, pushing more and more sweets, from wedding cakes to donuts, into her mouth, she still didn’t seem to grow any larger.

Admittedly, she was a sight to behold.

Her huge form had to be moved on a new wheeled bed, since the old one couldn’t keep her on any longer, and yet, due to her pear-shaped form, also the most recent one was having trouble to contain her. As usual, even though her breast had grown massive and her gut had grown gigantically, her butt was her biggest feature. So big and large that she was forced to lay on her stomach, it appeared as a veritable mountain of jelly like flesh, as it jiggled and wobbled at her every breath. Still, since he hadn’t decided yet if she was ready to become a meal, Phil hadn’t changed her feeding schedule and so she seemed to have reached her plateau.

Brad instead was still growing on.
Sure, he was smaller than his wife, still at a mere 520 pounds, but thanks to Christie flirts, he was speeding up a bit, adding more and more rolls on his already fattened up frame. As his wife he also had assumed a specific shape. Contrary to her he seemed to have been focusing his weigh in his gut, which had grown grotesquely huge, covering all his lower body up to his feet. It rarely was empty, as his feeding was also constant, and so it kept rising higher and higher toward the ceiling as a domed semi-sphere. The rest of his body didn’t fare too much differently.

He had still some mobility in his barrel like arms, but he was finding it harder and harder to move them as each day passed on. At his side, two maids were keeping him always stuffed to the brim, letting him rest a bit and then forcing him to eat more as soon as some more space freed in his growing gut.

Christie was growing too, at a slower pace than her two room companions, but still growing.

She was the most recent but also, the one most affected by Dr. Phil’s diet as she was, in truth, an experiment. True, Brad had requested her to be ‘healthier’ but the good doctor saw it also as an opportunity to test the effectiveness of an all liquid diet. The sludge she was constantly feeding off was nothing more than a glorified weight gain shake overloaded with chemicals to result addicting.

And she truly couldn’t stop herself from having it.

All her thoughts about her figure, her worries, even her precious family had been washed away by the heavenly tasty shake she was being fed with. She ballooned from a scars 140 scrawny little thing to the 200 plus chubby gal she was now.

And Phil could see how addicted she was to the stuff.

In the days where he would reduce her feeding, to slow her down, instead of gulping down shake she had started to try to suck it from the hose. Trying her hardest to have as much as she could, and even more beyond that. But, Phil knew that she couldn’t grow too big or Brad would probably lose interest, so he kept alternating her full on days, with days were he was giving her a smaller quantity so he could have her on a good track for the future.

“Hello there, Brad, Angelina. Just came for the usual checkup.”

Angelina grunted a few times as her maids forced in between her lips slice after slice of cake, she tried to raise her arm to greet the doctor but found herself unable to. This lately had left her quite bewildered but, with so much food surrounding her, her focus didn’t last long on trivial matters.

Brad instead slowly managed to raise his arm closing his ham-sized fist in a thumbs up sign, but also him soon found himself tired from that single exercise and gave it up as he opened his mouth to accept more hot dogs and burgers. Christie, instead, overdosed with the weight gain stimulant was blind to anything but food.

“So Brad, Angelina. The diet is proving successful and the treatment will continue, but both of you have done huge progress and I’m confident that at year’s end, your marriage can be considered saved.

Still, there are many that can’t afford, or don’t know ho to ask for help. For them I was thinking to offer some assistance but, I can’t do it alone.

What would you say to help me in this endeavor?”

Angelina, as the feeding stopped at Phil’s command, burped quite loudly and, after gasping for a while she replied in a deep voice, through ragged for she was starting to have problems to do even the simplest of things at her size.

“…Y…Ye-he-rsh...”

Brad instead seemed to think long and hard on it, keeping a scrunched-up face as he downed burger after burger, chewing them hard in thought.

“*Burp!*…urff…Alright…seems…ok…also…for…me.
You did…a good…job…with us.”

“Excellent! I’ll start right away with the preparations. But this doesn’t mean I will stop with the two of you.”

As Phil said so, he motioned for the maids to start anew with the feeding and, although Angelina seemed to want to add something else, she quickly found herself unable to talk as her constant feeding started anew. Philodendron had received their agreements and, most important, had it recorded.

Now he could start to build his paradise.

12422233333233232233223131311112413.content:
Philodendron had been ecstatic in the last few days. Thanks to the funds stored in his two new human banks (Brad and Angelina’s bank accounts) he had started the renovations on the mansion so that he could better host many new guests. But, as it always happens, something seemed to put a stop to his grandiose dream.

He was currently checking the camera feeds, after moving Brand and Angelina, along with Christie, in a more secluded section of the mansion he noticed that the bank accounts of the two actors had been suspended. At first, he thought that there had been a mistake. Between the two of them there had to be enough money to purchase a small nation but, as he checked more in detail he saw a suspension notice.

“Dear Miss Jolie,
As our client we are terribly sorry to inform you that we’ve had to place your accounts under suspension. As per our security checks it is possible that your bank accounts, and funds, may have been hacked and used for an enterprise for which you weren’t informed. Due to this we’re sending one of our agents to personally contact you since, it has been impossible from our side to contact you by any other means.
Hoping that this issue is only a simple misunderstanding,
Sincerely yours,
….”

Phil stopped reading, as he began to think on what the easiest solution to this issue could be.

For obvious reason he couldn’t let this lawyer to see the two over-grown actors.

He would simply get him arrested and tried to save the two from the path of gluttony upon which he had placed them. But there wasn’t also the time to let the lawyer grow slowly how it had been for Angelina & Brad.

Finally, after a long day of planning, Phil had a half idea on how to deal with this lawyer person. He had only to hope that the person coming wasn’t going to be one of those paranoids who saw troubles and dangers everywhere.

The following day, as Phil hastily finished his preparation against the lawyer representative, the doorbell of the mansion sounded and one of the maids informed him that a lawyer was requesting to enter and be shown the owners of the mansion. Phil let out a sigh, clearing his voice from any trembling and went to meet the person. As he entered the salon in which the lawyer was waiting Phil noticed that it was a young man, barely thirty, and was nervously fidgeting around.

Smiling the good doctor moved forward, greeting him with gentleness.

“Hello. You must be the Representative from Fitzgerald and Co., isn’t it?”

The guy turned and politely, albeit nervously, smiled to the doctor shaking his hand and then sitting opposite to him as he began the speech he had prepared for himself.

“Hello. Yes. I’m Jacob Vanderbird and I’ve been sent by the firm to verify the situation here for two of our best clients, Miss Jolie and Mister Pitt. There have been plenty of expenses in the last week alone and our firm had decided to investigate.
Especially since most of these expenses have been done in the name of a Philodendron Sweet.”

“That would be me. I see your worries but I can assure you that there is nothing illegal going on.

I’ve been employed by Miss Jolie to help her and her husband to keep a solid relationship with each other, something tha was crumbling down before my intervention.

The expenses have all been agreed first with them, as it is proved by the receipts that my accountant has in ours archive. I will gladly send copy of those to your firm.”

“Well, that solve most of our worries but, we still would like to meet our clients.”

“Unfortunately, that is a request to that I can’t satisfy as easily. You see both Miss Jolie and Mr. Pitt are currently undergoing long meditation session and cannot be disturbed for any reasons. Through these sessions the feelings they have for each other will be made stronger and so it is essential for them to keep all external influences away.”

“I see your point. But, we will not unfreeze their capitals until they have been met us. So, you could say, we’re in an impasse.”

“Hm. Mister Vanderbird, I think this matter shall be discussed further. Would you join me for a cup of tea? I understand your position, but I wouldn’t work for them if I let anyone through, disturbing them each and every time.”

“Gladly. And I’m sure you will make an exception for me as soon as we discuss it further.”

For the following two hours Phil and Jacob discussed about the situation, but, as time passed, Jacob began to feel somewhat strange. He didn’t feel ill, but it was as if he was getting more relaxed. Way too relaxed.

“Woah…I…I feel warm, all of a sudden…Uh? You…You were saying?”

“I understand your point and I would gladly agree but my employers do not wish to be disturbed. Now, If you were easy enough and calm enough we could talk about it in a gentle manner and reach finally a conclusion.”

Phil spoke clearly and willingly slow on certain words, knowing full well that the tea he had given to the lawyer was beginning to have its effects. It was a brew he had found to be used in the Amazonian jungles, one that those with his dietary preferences used to let someone willingly agree with them.

All it was needed were certain sounds and a certain emphasis on some words.

“I’m sure we can all agree that if my employer wanted to be disturbed, then Miss Jolie would personally tell you that she is willing to meet you. As she’s healthy of mind and body enough to let you know that.
Alas, there is no way that she will talk with you as she’s still in her meditation chamber. I’m afraid that you shall need to inform your superior about this situation. As we stand there’s really no point in letting this argument to continue.
What do you answer me, Jacob?”

“I…I thought…But…She said…I mean, she is healthy so…I don’t think…”

Phil smiled wickedly as if he could see the memories of the guy change thanks to the hypnotic effect of the tea he had drank.

There wasn’t much to it, just a few word here and there. Or, as in this case, he had just calmed him down at first with his ‘easy; calm; gentle’ and then he had simply began laying the trap emphasizing certain word until they formed a directive for Jacob to follow : ‘I agree, Miss Jolie is healthy, no need to continue.’.

He was now primed and ready to receive orders and memories.

“Tell me, Jacob. Do you agree?”

“Yes. She’s as healthy as I could find her. She’s just so busy. We won’t berate her further.”

“Good. Also, Jacob, do you have any family?”

“Yeah…I’ve got a girlfriend. Our parents are in another state…we rarely see each other nowadays.”

“Good. Listen to me, wait a few weeks and the leave that job.
Bring your girlfriend here. You both will live like royalty. You both deserve it.”

“I…I will. Yeah. We deserve to live a little. A vacation would do us good.”

“Yes it will, Jacob. Now, return to your bosses. Remember, everything is…?”

“Everything is clear. Both Miss Jolie and Mr. Pitt are alright.

They…uh? What just happened?”

Jacob Vanderbird felt as if he had just woken up from the quickest nap.

He was feeling some dizziness but, it was already passing so everything had to be ok. Still, he had closed an important job.

No matter how long that doctor had tried to prevent him, he still had managed to meet his clients and got their confirmation that everything was in order.

Sure, he felt a little bit embarrassed when they scolded him for the disturbance but, he still felt that he had done his job perfectly.

Phil’s voice shook him from his reverie.

“You alright there, Mr. Vanderbird?”

“Oh? Oh yeah. Just a bit dizzy. Thanks a lot Mr. Sweet. Now that I’ve been able to talk with them and assure myself that everything is in order there is no need for further disturbances.

And, sorry if I ask but, do you still work as a counselor for couples or are you working exclusively for them?”

“Well, I think I could spare some time for some advices… I’ll talk with Miss Jolie and, in case she agrees, will let my secretary to call you back.”

As the lawyer went away Phil grinned.

It wasn’t the first time he used that brew of tea but, it was the first time he had done it to purposely trick someone.

All he needed to do, now, was to call some friends over so that when Jacob would be back with his girlfriend there would be someone able to follow them in their life style change’… Or could it be better to keep things under the radar for a bit longer?

Choices, choices…
